attributes.action: Get Parliament to rethink Lancashire's lockdown regulations by postcode.
attributes.additional_details: The North West is the only area with an R rate lower than 1 and a growth rate being in the negative figures yet the majority of the North West is in Tier 3. Lancaster has a lower infection rate than all bar one London borough. Yet London has been put into Tier 2. We want the government to revaluate the Tier system in Lancashire.
attributes.background: I want the government to revaluate the entirety of Lancashire local lockdown being in Tier 3. Lancaster has 97.2 rate calculated on cases per 100,000 this week, Yorkshires rate is 170 but it is in Tier 2.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562010
